IsRaisingMoneySuccessful().return: bool : returns true/false if Raising EndPoint reached & assign shares to winning bidders

PlaceOrder(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: function for placing the bid ( for buying shares) or selling of shares(after end date only)

params._MaxPrice: , maximum amount amount willing to pay if buying or minimum amount asking ,if selling
params._nbShares: ,number of shares to be bought or sell
params._tradeDirection: ,If currentTime < EndDate , tradeDirection 0 = Buy & 1 = Buy && if currentTime > EndDate , tradeDirection 0=Buy (if stocks available ) && 1 = sell
